name: BridgeUpgradeable
description: Facilitates deposits, creation and voting of deposit proposals, and deposit executions.

parameterDecorators.name: newERC20Address
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of the newly created ERC20 token MinimalProxy.

parameterDecorators.name: newERC20Address
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of the newly created ERC20 token MinimalProxy.

parameterDecorators.name: newERC20Address
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of the newly created ERC20 token MinimalProxy.

parameterDecorators.name: newERC20Address
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of the newly created ERC20 token MinimalProxy.

parameterDecorators.name: newERC20Address
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of the newly created ERC20 token MinimalProxy.

parameterDecorators.name: newERC20Address
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of the newly created ERC20 token MinimalProxy.

parameterDecorators.name: newERC20Address
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of the newly created ERC20 token MinimalProxy.

functionDecorators.name: _domainID
functionDecorators.description: Exposing getter for {_domainID} instead of forcing the use of call.

functionDecorators.name: _hasVotedOnProposal
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if {relayer} has voted on {destNonce} {dataHash} proposal.Naming left unchanged for backward compatibility.

parameterDecorators.name: destNonce
parameterDecorators.description: destinationDomainID + depositNonce of the proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: dataHash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of data to be provided when deposit proposal is executed.

parameterDecorators.name: relayer
parameterDecorators.description: Address to check.

functionDecorators.name: _totalRelayers
functionDecorators.description: Returns total relayers number.Added for backwards compatibility.

functionDecorators.name: adminAddRelayer
functionDecorators.description: Grants {relayerAddress} the relayer role.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role, which is checked in grantRole().Emits {RelayerAdded} event.

parameterDecorators.name: relayerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of relayer to be added.

functionDecorators.name: adminChangeFeeHandler
functionDecorators.description: Changes deposit fee handler contract address.Only callable by admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newFeeHandler
parameterDecorators.description: Address {_feeHandler} will be updated to.

functionDecorators.name: adminChangeRelayerThreshold
functionDecorators.description: Modifies the number of votes required for a proposal to be considered passed.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role.Emits {RelayerThresholdChanged} event.

parameterDecorators.name: newThreshold
parameterDecorators.description: Value {_relayerThreshold} will be changed to.

functionDecorators.name: adminPauseTransfers
functionDecorators.description: Pauses deposits, proposal creation and voting, and deposit executions.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role.

functionDecorators.name: adminRemoveRelayer
functionDecorators.description: Removes relayer role for {relayerAddress}.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role, which is checked in revokeRole().Emits {RelayerRemoved} event.

parameterDecorators.name: relayerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of relayer to be removed.

functionDecorators.name: adminSetBurnable
functionDecorators.description: Sets a resource as burnable for handler contracts that use the IERCHandler interface.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role.

parameterDecorators.name: handlerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of handler resource will be set for.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of contract to be called when a deposit is made and a deposited is executed.

functionDecorators.name: adminSetDepositNonce
functionDecorators.description: Sets the nonce for the specific domainID.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role.

parameterDecorators.name: domainID
parameterDecorators.description: Domain ID for increasing nonce.

parameterDecorators.name: nonce
parameterDecorators.description: The nonce value to be set.

functionDecorators.name: adminSetForwarder
functionDecorators.description: Set a forwarder to be used.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role.

parameterDecorators.name: forwarder
parameterDecorators.description: Forwarder address to be added.

parameterDecorators.name: valid
parameterDecorators.description: Decision for the specific forwarder.

functionDecorators.name: adminSetGenericResource
functionDecorators.description: Sets a new resource for handler contracts that use the IGenericHandler interface, and maps the {handlerAddress} to {resourceID} in {_resourceIDToHandlerAddress}.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role.

parameterDecorators.name: handlerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of handler resource will be set for.

parameterDecorators.name: resourceID
parameterDecorators.description: ResourceID to be used when making deposits.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of contract to be called when a deposit is made and a deposited is executed.

functionDecorators.name: adminSetResource
functionDecorators.description: Sets a new resource for handler contracts that use the IERCHandler interface, and maps the {handlerAddress} to {resourceID} in {_resourceIDToHandlerAddress}.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role.

parameterDecorators.name: handlerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of handler resource will be set for.

parameterDecorators.name: resourceID
parameterDecorators.description: ResourceID to be used when making deposits.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of contract to be called when a deposit is made and a deposited is executed.

functionDecorators.name: adminUnpauseTransfers
functionDecorators.description: Unpauses deposits, proposal creation and voting, and deposit executions.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role.

functionDecorators.name: adminWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Used to manually withdraw funds from ERC safes.

parameterDecorators.name: handlerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of handler to withdraw from.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: ABI-encoded withdrawal params relevant to the specified handler.

functionDecorators.name: cancelProposal
functionDecorators.description: Cancels a deposit proposal that has not been executed yet.Only callable by relayers when Bridge is not paused.Proposal must be past expiry threshold.Emits {ProposalEvent} event with status {Cancelled}.

parameterDecorators.name: domainID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of chain deposit originated from.

parameterDecorators.name: depositNonce
parameterDecorators.description: ID of deposited generated by origin Bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: dataHash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of data originally provided when deposit was made.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Initiates a transfer using a specified handler contract.Only callable when Bridge is not paused.Emits {Deposit} event with all necessary parameters and a handler response. - ERC20Handler: responds with an empty data. - ERC721Handler: responds with the deposited token metadata acquired by calling a tokenURI method in the token contract. - GenericHandler: responds with the raw bytes returned from the call to the target contract.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationDomainID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of chain deposit will be bridged to.

parameterDecorators.name: resourceID
parameterDecorators.description: ResourceID used to find address of handler to be used for deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: depositData
parameterDecorators.description: Additional data to be passed to specified handler.

parameterDecorators.name: feeData
parameterDecorators.description: Additional data to be passed to the fee handler.

functionDecorators.name: executeProposal
functionDecorators.description: Executes a deposit proposal that is considered passed using a specified handler contract.Only callable by relayers when Bridge is not paused.Proposal must have Passed status.Hash of {data} must equal proposal's {dataHash}.Emits {ProposalEvent} event with status {Executed}.Emits {FailedExecution} event with the failed reason.

parameterDecorators.name: domainID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of chain deposit originated from.

parameterDecorators.name: depositNonce
parameterDecorators.description: ID of deposited generated by origin Bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Data originally provided when deposit was made.

parameterDecorators.name: resourceID
parameterDecorators.description: ResourceID to be used when making deposits.

parameterDecorators.name: revertOnFail
parameterDecorators.description: Decision if the transaction should be reverted in case of handler's executeProposal is reverted or not.

functionDecorators.name: getProposal
functionDecorators.description: Returns a proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: originDomainID
parameterDecorators.description: Chain ID deposit originated from.

parameterDecorators.name: depositNonce
parameterDecorators.description: ID of proposal generated by proposal's origin Bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: resourceID
parameterDecorators.description: ResourceID used to find address of handler to be used for deposit.

returnDecorators.description: Proposal which consists of: - _dataHash Hash of data to be provided when deposit proposal is executed. - _yesVotes Number of votes in favor of proposal. - _noVotes Number of votes against proposal. - _status Current status of proposal.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMember
functionDecorators.description: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMemberCount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMemberIndex
functionDecorators.description: Returns the index of the account that have `role`.

functionDecorators.name: grantRole
functionDecorators.description: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: hasRole
functionDecorators.description: Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializes Bridge, creates and grants {_msgSender()} the admin role, creates and grants {initialRelayers} the relayer role.

parameterDecorators.name: domainID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of chain the Bridge contract exists on.

parameterDecorators.name: initialRelayers
parameterDecorators.description: Addresses that should be initially granted the relayer role.

parameterDecorators.name: initialRelayerThreshold
parameterDecorators.description: Number of votes needed for a deposit proposal to be considered passed.

functionDecorators.name: isRelayer
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if {relayer} has the relayer role.

parameterDecorators.name: relayer
parameterDecorators.description: Address to check.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: renounceAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Removes admin role from {_msgSender()} and grants it to {newAdmin}.Only callable by an address that currently has the admin role.

parameterDecorators.name: newAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address that admin role will be granted to.

functionDecorators.name: renounceRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

functionDecorators.name: revokeRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: transferFunds
functionDecorators.description: Transfers eth in the contract to the specified addresses. The parameters addrs and amounts are mapped 1-1. This means that the address at index 0 for addrs will receive the amount (in WEI) from amounts at index 0.

parameterDecorators.name: addrs
parameterDecorators.description: Array of addresses to transfer {amounts} to.

parameterDecorators.name: amounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array of amonuts to transfer to {addrs}.

functionDecorators.name: voteProposal
functionDecorators.description: When called, {_msgSender()} will be marked as voting in favor of proposal.Only callable by relayers when Bridge is not paused.Proposal must not have already been passed or executed.{_msgSender()} must not have already voted on proposal.Emits {ProposalEvent} event with status indicating the proposal status.Emits {ProposalVote} event.

parameterDecorators.name: domainID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of chain deposit originated from.

parameterDecorators.name: depositNonce
parameterDecorators.description: ID of deposited generated by origin Bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Data originally provided when deposit was made.
